title: Digital Badge Program Design and Operation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design principles and foundational knowledge of digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course emphasizing learning achievement visualization and motivation strategies through digital badges

learning_goals: Learners can analyze functional elements of digital badges (metadata, visual design) and apply them to program design.
Learners can develop a digital badge system incorporating feedback from three or more iterative design phases.
Learners can design badge types (basic/intermediate/advanced) and acquisition criteria to enhance learner motivation.

resources: Badge Creation Platform (Open Badges), Learning Management System (LMS), Feedback Collection Tool

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
